title: Episode 84 - The Consequences Of McCarthyism
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
In this episode, we explore the consequences of McCarthyism on American Society and the Cold War and its lasting effects on the United States.

For pictures for this episode and more go to our website at: 
 www.historyofthecoldwarpodcast.com/
